Pre-Game Insights: Iceland will be aiming to start their 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaign with a victory when they welcome Montenegro in Group 4 of League B on Friday night.
Iceland finished second in Group 2 of League B last time out, while Montenegro were third in Group 3 of the same division in their last Nations League campaign.
Iceland have faced Montenegro only once before, suffering a 2-1 defeat in a friendly in 2012.
Montenegro were promoted from League C in the 2020-21 competition and finished third in Group 3 of League B in 2022-23.
Iceland's form (all competitions): W, W, W, L, W, L. Montenegro's form (all competitions): W, L, W, W, L, L.
